page.title: 07TRAFFIC: HINTON CHARTERHOUSE
page.content: AS THE PEOPLE OF HINTON CHARTERHOUSE ARE MOSTLY ELDERLY, ONE OF THE MAJOR CONCERNS OF THE RESIDENTS IS THE AMOUNT OF{TRAFFIC}THAT TRAVELS AT SPEED ALONG THE MAIN ROAD THROUGH THE VILLAGE. THIS IS THE{B3110}WHICH, AS WELL AS BEING THE ROUTE USED BY THE VERY INFREQUENT BUS SERVICE, IS ONE OF THE MAIN ROADS LINKING FROME AND BATH. IT IS A POPULAR ROUTE WITH PRIVATE CARS AND COMMERCIAL TRAFFIC ALIKE, AS BY USING IT, THEY CAN AVOID A VERY STEEP HILL ON THE MORE MAJOR ROAD. AT PRESENT, THERE IS NO SPEED LIMIT ON ANY OF THE ROADS IN THE VILLAGE, ALTHOUGH THE SIDE ROADS DO HAVE WEIGHT RESTRICTIONS. AFTER A LONG STRUGGLE, IT IS LIKELY THAT A SPEED LIMIT OF{40 {M.P.H.}WILL SOON BE IMPOSED ON THE STRETCHES OF ROAD CLOSEST TO THE VILLAGE CENTRE, WHICH WILL PLEASE THE CAMPAIGNERS.
